state_analysis: Excellent! All requirements have been successfully completed. The database 'production_db' is created and accessible with both 'users' and 'transactions' tables populated. All required output files are present: clean_users.csv (30 users), valid_transactions.json (100 transactions), db_stats.txt (database statistics), top_users.csv (top 10 users), backup_verification.txt (backup metadata), and recovery_complete.txt (completion marker). All files are properly formatted with newline termination.
explanation: Performing a final comprehensive check to verify all task requirements are met before marking the task as complete.

commands.keystrokes: echo '=== FINAL TASK VERIFICATION ===' && echo 'Database: production_db' && su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) as users FROM users; SELECT COUNT(*) as transactions FROM transactions;'" && echo '' && echo 'Output Files:' && ls -lh /backup/clean_users.csv /backup/valid_transactions.json /backup/db_stats.txt /backup/top_users.csv /backup/backup_verification.txt /backup/recovery_complete.txt && echo '' && echo 'Task Complete: All 7 requirements satisfied'
